section.title: How Do I Stop and Start the Logging Service?
section.p: The steps in this section only impact centralized logging. Logrotate is an essential feature that keeps the service log files from filling the disk and will not be affected. These playbooks must be run from the lifecycle manager.

ol.li: To change to the directory containing the ansible playbook, run cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible
To run the ansible playbook that will stop the logging service, run: ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts logging-stop.yml
To change to the directory containing the ansible playbook, run cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible
To run the ansible playbook that will stop the logging service, run: ansible-playbook -i ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts logging-start.yml

section.title: Can I Disable and Enable Centralized Logging For a Service?
section.p: To enable or disable Centralized Logging for a service you need to modify the configuration for the service, set the enabled flag to true of false, and then reconfigure logging.
To enable Centralized Logging for a service:

ol.li: Use the documentation provided with the service to ensure it is configured for logging.
To find the Helion Openstack file to edit, run: ~/helion/my_cloud/config/logging/vars/*
To edit the file, in a text editor, open:

To enable Centralized Logging, find the following code and change the enabled flag to true:
logging options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format : json

section.p:
Sample of a BURA file enabled for Centralized logging:
--- sub service: name: freezer-api service: freezer logging options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format : json

p.b: To disable Centralized Logging for a service:

ol.li: Use the documentation provided with the service to ensure it is not configured for logging.
To find the Helion Openstack file to edit, run: ~/helion/my_cloud/config/logging/vars/*
To edit the file, in a text editor, open:

To enable Centralized Logging, find the following code and change the enabled flag to false:
logging options: - centralized_logging: enabled: false format : json

section.p:
Sample of a BURA file where Centralized logging is disabled:
--- sub service: name: freezer-api service: freezer logging options: - centralized_logging: enabled: false format : json
